episodes.title: Michael Todd & Carl Lentz | Stories Behind The Headlines
episodes.description:
In this compelling episode of the Lights On Podcast, Michael Todd and Carl Lentz sit down for an unfiltered conversation about leadership, redemption, and navigating faith in the modern world. Together, they share personal stories, insights on overcoming challenges, and their thoughts on the future of the church. Whether you're looking for inspiration, wisdom, or a fresh perspective, this episode is packed with powerful moments you won't want to miss. Tune in and join the conversation!

episodes.title: The Breakthrough Is On The Way.. | Carl & Laura Lentz Get Real
episodes.description:
🔦 Lights On With Carl Lentz: Get Vulnerable with Carl & Laura Lentz! 🔦 In this heartfelt and inspiring episode of "Lights On," Carl Lentz sits down with his wife, Laura Lentz, to share an intimate look into their personal journey of healing and growth. Carl opens up about his experiences and the challenges he faced while being overly paced in life and ministry. Together, they reflect on the pressures that come with a high-profile life and the impact it had on their relationship. Laura joins Carl in a candid conversation about their renewed bond, the steps they've taken to rebuild their relationship, and the importance of slowing down to truly heal. This episode is a testament to the power of resilience, love, and the commitment to personal and mutual growth. Join Carl and Laura as they offer valuable insights and encouragement to those navigating similar paths, emphasizing that no matter how difficult the journey, healing and renewal are possible with faith and determination.

episodes.title: Carl Lentz & His Families Therapist.. | Crucial Insight On Parenting Teens | Lights On
episodes.description: In this episode, Carl Lentz dives into some of the most pressing issues faced by parents of teenagers today. The discussion covers: Parents with Teens: Understanding the unique challenges and dynamics of raising teenagers in the modern world. Teen Suicide and Eating Disorders: Shedding light on these critical issues, providing insights, and offering support to parents dealing with these serious concerns. How to Reach Your Teens: Practical advice and strategies to foster open communication and build strong, trusting relationships with your teens. How to Stay Motivated as a Parent: Tips and encouragement for parents to stay resilient and motivated, even during tough times. Join Carl Lentz as he brings compassion, expertise, and valuable advice to help parents navigate the complex journey of raising teenagers. episodes.title: Carl & Laura Lentz Open Up To Their Daughters (Vulnerable Conversation)
episodes.description: In this raw and revealing episode, Carl and Laura Lentz, joined by their daughters Charlie and Ava, have a heartfelt conversation about healing and family resilience. Carl opens up about his journey to true healing, and the Lentz family discusses the struggles and pain they faced behind the scenes during their scandal. In an honest and surprising moment, Charlie and Ava ask their parents about their sex life after healing, leading to an insightful and open dialogue. This episode dives deep into the complexities of family, love, and recovery, offering a unique perspective on overcoming adversity. 0:00 - Introduction and Context 1:51 - The Lentz's Journey as a Family: The Girls' Perspective 4:14 - Getting to a Place of Forgiveness 8:22 - The Biggest Party in Florida 10:40 - Communicating After the Trauma, How Charlie Found Out 16:40 - Download the BSIDE App 17:26 - Say Goodbye 20:13 - Laura and Carl: Figuring out the Best Way for the Kids 23:37 - The Importance of Being Honest 26:20 - How Ava Found Out 30:13 - What Ava And Charlie Found Out About Laura 31:54 - Starting Over: When to Trust Again 34:04 - Intimacy and Trauma 38:42 - What Ava And Charlie Found Out About Laura 41:53 - Powerful Honesty, and Fighting Frustration 45:05 - What Ava Thinks of Marriage Now 47:02 - We Know too Much 49:36 - What Charlie Thinks of Marriage Now 51:40 - Vulnerability, Accountability and Honesty

episodes.title: THE Brain Expert: THIS Will Heal Your MIND | Dr. Amen & Carl Lentz (Secrets You Didn't Know)
episodes.description: Find Dr. Amen https://www.instagram.com/doc_amen/?hl=en In this enlightening conversation, Carl Lentz sits down with renowned psychiatrist Dr. Daniel Amen. Carl is a patient of Dr. Amen, & he dives deep to explore crucial topics related to mental and physical well-being. They dive deep into: Addiction: Understanding the roots of addiction and effective ways to overcome it. Creating a Healthy Brain: Tips and strategies to nurture and maintain a healthy brain. Avoiding Marijuana Consumption: Insights into the effects of marijuana on the brain and why avoiding it can be beneficial. And Much More: Additional advice and wisdom on living a healthier, more balanced life. Dr. Amen, with his vast expertise in brain health, provides invaluable guidance and practical tips that can transform your approach to mental wellness. Whether you're struggling with addiction, looking to enhance your brain health, or curious about the impact of marijuana, this conversation is packed with actionable advice and thought-provoking insights. Don’t miss this chance to learn from two influential voices on how to lead a healthier, more fulfilling life. episodes.title: Lights On with Carl Lentz | Trailer
episodes.description: “Lights on” will be available on 06.04.24. My choices, and the road toward recovery taught me how helpful it is to have people share vulnerably the impact of their bad choices, the pain they caused, and the pain they suffered that led them to make those choices, and what they’ve discovered can be helpful and healing. My hope is that in sharing those things from my story and asking others to share theirs, it will be helpful, hopeful and healing. I’m thankful for where we are today. To be confident of the future, content in the present and healed enough to speak to the past is miraculous. If we can make it, anybody can…thank you for all the love and support!
